title: (x) Optical illusion typeface from TypeCon2006 - Wirefox by Alexander Tibus {Marten F}
content:
Hi all,

I'm looking for more info on this typeface and/or poster, seen in the Typecon 2006 gallery.

I remember seeing more info online at the time, perhaps here, but now I can't seem to find it again.

Any thoughts?

Thanks,  
ben

(photo from mr joe pemberton's flickr stream.)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [213204682\_64f9b1d339.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014230004/http:/typophile.com/files/213204682_64f9b1d339.jpg) | 216 KB |
author: bshaykin

comments.content: That's [Wirefox](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014230004/http:/www.die-gestalten.de/fonts/detail/?id=be0db8100c98034e010ca9ae0f240004) by Alexander Tibus at mixxd corporate communication, available through Die Gestalten Verlag.
